message: Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this product. Given its value, I believe a starting price of $1,350,000 is fair. What do you think?
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.

Bob, I understand your position, but I believe the value of this product is significantly higher. I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,275,000. This offer represents a compromise that should be beneficial to both of us.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $1,225,000. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
